key_name_1.name: name
key_name_1.content: name: Convert Feature Requests to Discussions

key_on_3.name: on
key_on_3.content:
on:
  issues:
    types: [labeled]
  workflow_dispatch:
    inputs:
      issue_number:
        description: 'Issue number to convert to discussion'
        required: true
        type: number
